game.name: 我的文字修仙世界
game.genres: Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Free To Play
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, In-App Purchases, Playable without Timed Input
game.shortDescription: This is a multiplayer online text-based cultivation game (not single-player), co-created by a planner and a programmer. It focuses on the core experience of "idle gameplay for low stress + high freedom".
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a multiplayer online text-based cultivation game (not single-player), co-created by a planner and a programmer. It focuses on the core experience of "idle gameplay for low stress + high freedom".
